de.systemagmbh.tools.util
Class CSysDateConverter

java.lang.Object
  de.systemagmbh.tools.util.CSysDateConverter
public final class CSysDateConverter
extends Object

CSysDateConverter handles Timestamps formatted as Strings. It is able to convert between pre-defined formats and Date / or create timestamps. Also as of 21.1.02 ISO 8601 format converstion.

Version:
$Revision: 1.3 $
Author:
Mike Hogan, Herbert Helmstreit

                                       int formatId)
                                throws ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
Convert a Date Object into a formatted String using a special pattern.

Parameters:
date - the time value to be formatted into a time String.
formatId - the format id of the date format pattern
Returns:
the formatted time String.
Throws:
ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - if the formatId is unknown

fromFormattedString

public static Date fromFormattedString(String dateString,
                                       int formatId)
                                throws ParseException,
                                       ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
Convert a formatted String into a Date Object.

Parameters:
dateString - date/time string to be parsed
formatId - the format id of the string's format
Returns:
Date Object representing the date/time of the dateString.
Throws:
ParseException - If the given string cannot be parsed as a date.
ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - if the formatId is unknown

convertFormattedString

public static String convertFormattedString(String dateString,
                                            int fromFormatId,
                                            int toFormatId)
                                     throws ParseException,
                                            ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
Converts a date String from one format to another.

Parameters:
dateString - date/time string to be converted
fromFormatId - the format id of the string's format
toFormatId - the format id of the result format
Returns:
the converted time String.
Throws:
ParseException - If the given string cannot be parsed as a date.
ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - if one of the formatId's is unknown

toIsoDate

public static String toIsoDate(Date date)
mh 21.1.02: for ISO 8601 format converstion. Generate a ISO 8601 date from a Java Date object

Parameters:
date - a Date instance
Returns:
a string representing the date in the ISO 8601 format

fromIsoDate

public static Date fromIsoDate(String isodate)
mh 21.1.02: for ISO 8601 format converstion. Parse the given string in ISO 8601 format and build a Java Date object.

Parameters:
isodate - the date in ISO 8601 format
Returns:
a Date instance or null if the parse fails
